definition: to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to look at/to regard/to inspect
old variant of 視|视[shi4]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
visitation rights (law)

sentences.english: This patient is not allowed visitors.
sentences.chinese: 这个病人是不允许探视的。

sentences.english: The attendant should make the patient happy and hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 探视病人应使患者充满希望和快乐。

sentences.english: She visited him in jail and hid for four days.
sentences.chinese: 其后，该女子到监狱探视同伙，并在监狱中藏了四天。

sentences.english: Japan’sman in Taiwancalled on the Taiwanese captain, but offered no formal apology.
sentences.chinese: 日驻台官员探视了台籍船长，不过并未官方道歉。

sentences.english: Our neighbor stops by later with a box of get-well candy.
sentences.chinese: 我们的邻居拿了一盒糖果来探视。

sentences.english: Roger has a pass to get into the hospital after visiting hours.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰有探视时间之外可以进入医院的出入证。

sentences.english: The manager released him to return to his native town to visit his grandmother who was ill in bed.
sentences.chinese: 经理准许他休假回老家探视染病在床的祖母。

sentences.english: The head of the IHA once publicly chided the crown prince for not visiting his parents more frequently.
sentences.chinese: 宫内厅长官曾为皇储不常探视双亲而发出公开指责。

sentences.english: The nurse allowed them two to visit the patient.
sentences.chinese: 护士允许他们两人探视病人。

sentences.english: The doctor visits his patience every day .
sentences.chinese: 这个医生每天去探视他的病人。

sentences.english: Your visit may give some comfort to the patient.
sentences.chinese: 你来探视或许能给病人带来些许安慰。

sentences.english: They also said the hospital's general visitation policy does not discriminate against same-sex couples.
sentences.chinese: 管理人员还说医院的探视规定是不会歧视同性伴侣的。

sentences.english: He requested joint custody and a visitation schedule with the children.
sentences.chinese: 他要求享有同样的监护权，并且能够探视孩子。

sentences.english: He has said he would visit the stricken area after Easter Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 他说，星期天复活节过后，他将探视地震灾区。

sentences.english: Tourists visiting friends and relatives asked questions XVII should pay attention to what matters?
sentences.chinese: 第十七题旅游者要求探视亲友应注意哪些事项？

sentences.english: You can visit the patient on condition that you only stay five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只呆五分钟，就让人探视病人。

definition: to visit/to call on sb/to look around
to visit a sick person or patient
to visit/to pay a call to
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
to inquire into/to ask after
to inquire into/to ask after
to check/to investigate/to probe (into)
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
to nurse/to look after/to watch over/(old) hospital nurse
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to inquire about
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
in custody/to keep sb in detention
to tend/to take care of sb
